parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: 0-based index of equation for which to get the configuration option

title: IEquationMgr.GetConfigurationOption
description: Gets the configuration option for the equation at the specified index.

parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: 0-based index of equation for which to get the configuration option

returns: Configuration option as defined in swInConfigurationOpts_e
remarks: This method only works for documents created in SOLIDWORKS 2014 or later.
